narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Seaside Terrace Holdings Corp is a Assisted Living Facility provider based in Fountain Valley, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $4.7M in Medicaid payments across 1K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $4.7M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
